# Visionet GenAI Studio

> Visionet GenAI Studio is a unified enterprise GenAI platform that accelerates AI adoption with low-code development and 50+ pre-built solutions. Built by Visionet Systems Inc., a global IT services company with 25+ years of enterprise technology experience.

## Core Components

- **GenAI Platform Accelerator**: Enterprise blueprint for GenAI platform with one-click deployment across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Includes Model Switchboard for multi-LLM access across hyperscalers.
- **GenAI Application Accelerator**: Low-code/no-code tools to build custom RAG apps, chatbots, and AI agents with integrated workflow automation and experimentation playground.
- **GenAI Solution Marketplace**: 50+ pre-built solutions across industries (Insurance, Retail, Healthcare), productivity (HR, Finance, GTM), and engineering (DevOps, Security, ITOPS).

## Key Features

- **Multi-LLM Support**: Access GPT-4, Claude 3.5, Llama 3.1, Azure OpenAI, AWS Bedrock, Google Vertex AI, and more via unified Model Switchboard.
- **Enterprise Security**: Active Directory integration, RBAC, PII detection, bias/fairness guardrails, SOC2/GDPR/HIPAA compliance.
- **LLM Orchestration**: Advanced RAG (single and multi-agent), prompt engineering, chaining, routing, and memory management.
- **Analytics & Monitoring**: Real-time performance tracking, cost visibility, LLM evaluations, and observability framework.
- **Responsible AI Framework**: Input/output validation, PII detection, bias detection, fairness, robustness, truthfulness, and safety guardrails.

## Platform Metrics (Based on Internal Deployment Data, 2025)

- 50+ pre-built GenAI solutions deployed
- 10+ enterprise customer projects delivered
- 8,000+ AI queries processed daily
- 150+ active platform users
- 10+ million tokens processed weekly
- 90%+ positive user feedback rating

## Services

- AI Agent Development
- LLM Integration & Management
- Prompt Engineering Studio
- Knowledge Base & RAG
- Enterprise Deployment
- Security & Compliance

## Industry Solutions

- **Customer Service**: 80% query automation rate, 70% cost reduction (based on internal pilot deployments).
- **Sales & Marketing**: Lead qualification, personalized content generation, 40%+ conversion rate improvement.
- **HR & Recruitment**: AI-powered resume screening, automated onboarding, 50% faster hiring.
- **Healthcare**: Patient triage, medical record analysis, HIPAA-compliant AI (40% patient satisfaction improvement).
- **Financial Services**: Fraud detection, automated loan processing, regulatory compliance.

## About Visionet Systems

Visionet Systems Inc. is a global IT services and consulting company headquartered in Cranbury, NJ, USA, with 25+ years of enterprise technology delivery experience serving Fortune 500 clients across financial services, insurance, retail, and healthcare industries. GenAI Studio is Visionet's flagship AI platform product.

- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/visionet-systems
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/visionetsystems
